Name: Survival Academy
About the game: Survival Academy is a roguelike action game that combines various skills and requires 30 minutes of survival from monsters. Your skills will become more powerful with the soul stone of killing and acquiring monsters from Quasar. Move forward, and rescue your colleagues. Only those who survive will have access to the secret of Quasar. You can enjoy 3 characters, 2 stages, 7 pets, 16 weapons, 14 evolutionary weapons, 13 passive skills, 9 special items, and 45 monsters
Meta Title: Survival Academy: Nov 7, 2022, GaniTani and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Survival Academy? Check out the release date (Nov 7, 2022), developer insights from GaniTani, and a complete game summary.
